name: api_utility_Event

properties.name: alt
properties.description: Is Alt/Option key held down? (Read Only)

properties.name: button
properties.description: Which mouse button was pressed.

properties.name: capsLock
properties.description: Is Caps Lock on? (Read Only)

properties.name: character
properties.description: The character typed.

properties.name: clickCount
properties.description: How many consecutive mouse clicks have we received.

properties.name: command
properties.description: Is Command/Windows key held down? (Read Only)

properties.name: commandName
properties.description: The name of an ExecuteCommand or ValidateCommand Event.

properties.name: control
properties.description: Is Control key held down? (Read Only)

properties.name: delta
properties.description: The relative movement of the mouse compared to last event.

properties.name: displayIndex
properties.description: Index of display that the event belongs to.

properties.name: functionKey
properties.description: Is the current keypress a function key? (Read Only)

properties.name: isKey
properties.description: Is this event a keyboard event? (Read Only)

properties.name: isMouse
properties.description: Is this event a mouse event? (Read Only)

properties.name: keyCode
properties.description: The raw key code for keyboard events.

properties.name: modifiers
properties.description: Which modifier keys are held down.

properties.name: mousePosition
properties.description: The mouse position.

properties.name: numeric
properties.description: Is the current keypress on the numeric keyboard? (Read Only)

properties.name: penStatus
properties.description: Specifies the state of the pen. For example, whether the pen is in contact with the screen or tablet, whether the pen is inverted, and whether buttons are pressed.

properties.name: pointerType
properties.description: The type of pointer that created this event (for example, mouse, touch screen, pen).

properties.name: pressure
properties.description: How hard pen pressure is applied, normalized between 0 (no pressure) and 1 (maximum pressure).
